languages.text: {n}В уголке глаза человека появляется слеза, он беспокойно бьется в путах проводов, пронзающих тело.{/n} "Мы сражались. Мы отрезали отсек за отсеком, как отрезают гниющую плоть. Но оно шло за нами. Его незримое влияние, источаемая им скверна — она забирала нас, одного за другим. Команда — люди из плоти, такие слабые, так легко поддающиеся... Мы не смогли спасти их от зла — и отдали корабль межзвездной тьме".

traits.locale_text: {n}В уголке глаза человека появляется слеза, он беспокойно бьется в путах проводов, пронзающих тело.{/n} "Мы сражались... мы отсекали отсек за отсеком, как отсекают гниющую плоть... но оно шло за нами. Говорило из стен, шептало из вентиляционных проходов... Команда... люди из плоти, такие слабые, так легко поддающиеся... Мы не смогли спасти их от зла — и отдали корабль межзвездной тьме".

languages.text: {n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."
languages.original_text: {n}В уголке глаза человека появляется слеза, он беспокойно бьется в путах проводов, пронзающих тело.{/n} "Мы сражались. Мы отрезали отсек за отсеком, как отрезают гниющую плоть. Но оно шло за нами. Его незримое влияние, источаемая им скверна — она забирала нас, одного за другим. Команда — люди из плоти, такие слабые, так легко поддающиеся... Мы не смогли спасти их от зла — и отдали корабль межзвездной тьме".

We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

{n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the bonds of the wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, like one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. It spoke from the walls, it whispered from the ventilation shafts. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil — and we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

{n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

languages.text: {n}他的眼角流下了泪水，身体在混乱的电线之中拼命挣扎着。{/n}“我们奋起反抗，我们切掉了一个又一个模块，就像切掉烂肉一样，可它还是跟了上来。它散发出腐化的气息，无形地影响着我们所有人……将我们一个接一个地拖入它的魔爪。那些船员只是有血有肉的普通人，他们是如此脆弱，如此容易屈服……我们无法将他们从邪恶之物的手中拯救出来，于是我们将这艘船托付给了群星之中的黑暗。”
languages.original_text: {n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的眼角流下了泪水，身体在混乱的电线之中拼命挣扎着。{/n}“我们奋起反抗，我们切掉了一个又一个模块，就像切掉烂肉一样，可它还是跟了上来。它在舱壁中低语，在通风井中低语。那些船员只是有血有肉的普通人，他们是如此脆弱，如此容易屈服……我们无法将他们从邪恶之物的手中拯救出来，于是我们将这艘船托付给了群星之中的黑暗。”

languages.text: {n}Una lágrima aparece en la esquina de su ojo y se debate frenéticamente contra la maraña de cables que atraviesan su cuerpo.{/n} «Luchamos. Desconectamos un módulo tras otro, como quien amputa carne putrefacta. Pero nos siguió. Su influjo invisible, la corrupción que emanaba... se apoderó de nosotros uno tras otro. Los tripulantes eran solo humanos de carne y hueso, débiles, y sucumbieron fácilmente... No pudimos salvarlos de la maldad, por lo que entregamos la nave a la oscuridad que hay entre las estrellas».
languages.original_text: {n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una lágrima aparece en la esquina de su ojo y se debate frenéticamente contra la maraña de cables que atraviesan su cuerpo.{/n} «Luchamos. Desconectamos un módulo tras otro, como quien amputa carne putrefacta. Pero nos siguió. Nos hablaba desde las paredes, susurrando desde los conductos de ventilación. Los tripulantes eran solo humanos de carne y hueso, débiles, y sucumbieron fácilmente... No pudimos salvarlos de la maldad, por lo que entregamos la nave a la oscuridad que hay entre las estrellas».

languages.text: {n}目の端には涙が滲み、男は体を突き刺しているゴチャゴチャのワイヤーの中で必死にジタバタと動く。{/n} 「戦ったんだ。次々にモジュールを切断して、腐った肉を切り落とす奴もいた。それでも付いてくる。その目に見えぬ影響力、にじみ出る腐敗…それは我々を一人ひとり、堕としていった。クルーはただの肉と血でできた人間だ…とても弱い。あっけなく屈してしまった…仲間達を悪から救うことができず、星の中の暗闇に船を渡した」
languages.original_text: {n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}目の端には涙が滲み、男は体を突き刺しているゴチャゴチャのワイヤーの中で必死にジタバタと動く。{/n} 「戦ったんだ。次々にモジュールを切断して、腐った肉を切り落とす奴もいた。それでも付いてくる。壁から話しかけて、換気シャフトから囁いた。クルーはただの肉と血でできた人間だ…とても弱い。あっけなく屈してしまった…仲間達を悪から救うことができず、星の中の暗闇に船を渡した」

languages.text: {n}Eine Träne erscheint in seinem Augenwinkel, und er greift hektisch in den Kabelsalat, der seinen Körper durchbohrt.{/n} "Wir haben gekämpft. Wir haben ein Modul nach dem anderen abgetrennt, so wie man verfaulendes Fleisch wegschneidet. Aber es ist uns gefolgt. Sein unsichtbarer Einfluss, die von ihm ausgehende Verderbnis ... sie hat uns befallen, einen nach dem anderen. Die Crew bestand nur aus Menschen aus Fleisch und Blut, die schwach waren und sich rasch ergaben ... Wir konnten sie nicht vor dem Bösen retten, also überließen wir das Schiff der Dunkelheit der Sterne."
languages.original_text: {n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Träne erscheint in seinem Augenwinkel, und er greift hektisch in den Kabelsalat, der seinen Körper durchbohrt.{/n} "Wir haben gekämpft. Wir haben ein Modul nach dem anderen abgetrennt, so wie man verfaulendes Fleisch wegschneidet. Aber es ist uns gefolgt. Es sprach aus den Wänden, flüsterte aus den Belüftungsschächten. Die Crew bestand nur aus Menschen aus Fleisch und Blut, die schwach waren und sich rasch ergaben ... Wir konnten sie nicht vor dem Bösen retten, also überließen wir das Schiff der Dunkelheit der Sterne."

languages.text: {n}Une larme apparaît au coin de son œil, et il se débat comme un forcené dans l'enchevêtrement de câbles qui transpercent son corps de part en part.{/n} « Nous nous sommes battus. Nous avons condamné un module après l'autre comme on ampute un membre gangréné, mais le mal nous a poursuivis. L'un après l'autre, nous avons cédé à son influence invisible, à la corruption qu'il exsudait... L'équipage ne comptait guère que des humains de chair et de sang, des êtres faibles qui ont rapidement succombé... Nous ne pouvions rien pour les sauver, alors nous avons abandonné le vaisseau aux ténèbres astrales. »
languages.original_text: {n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une larme apparaît au coin de son œil, et il se débat comme un forcené dans l'enchevêtrement de câbles qui transpercent son corps de part en part.{/n} « Nous nous sommes battus. Nous avons condamné un module après l'autre comme on ampute un membre gangréné, mais le mal nous a poursuivis. Il nous parlait à travers les cloisons, il murmurait à nos oreilles par les bouches d'aération. L'équipage ne comptait guère que des humains de chair et de sang, des êtres faibles qui ont rapidement succombé... Nous ne pouvions rien pour les sauver, alors nous avons abandonné le vaisseau aux ténèbres astrales. »

languages.text: {n}Adamın göz pınarında bir damla yaş beliriyor, bedenini delip geçen karman çorman kablo yığını arasında çılgıncasına debeleniyor.{/n} "Onunla savaştık. Çürümüş etleri kesip atar gibi ardı ardına modül bağlantılarını kestik lakin bir türlü peşimizi bırakmadı. Görünmez nüfuzu, yaydığı yozluk bizleri teker teker pençesine aldı. Mürettebatımız, en nihayetinde etten kemikten insanlardan oluşuyordu. Hâliyle zayıftılar, kolayca boyun eğdiler. Onları şerden kurtaramadık, biz de gemiyi yıldızlar arasındaki karanlığa gömdük."
languages.original_text: {n}A tear appears at the corner of his eye, he thrashes frantically in the mess of wires piercing his body.{/n} "We fought. We cut off one module after another, as one cuts away rotting flesh. But it followed. Its invisible influence, the corruption it exuded — it claimed us, one by one. The crew were merely humans of flesh and blood, they were so weak, they succumbed so easily... We could not save them from evil, and so we gave the ship to the darkness among the stars."

Çürümüş etleri kesip atar gibi ardı ardına modül bağlantılarını kestik lakin bir türlü peşimizi bırakmadı. Görünmez nüfuzu, yaydığı yozluk bizleri teker teker pençesine aldı. Mürettebatımız, en nihayetinde etten kemikten insanlardan oluşuyordu. Hâliyle zayıftılar, kolayca boyun eğdiler. Onları şerden kurtaramadık, biz de gemiyi yıldızlar arasındaki karanlığa gömdük."
